text: Even Jostein Pellerud (born 15 July 1953) is a Norwegian football coach and former player. He played for clubs like VÃ¥lerenga and Kongsvinger. As a coach, he led the Norway women's national football team to silver at the 1991 Women's World Cup, made them world champions in 1995, and secured a bronze at the 1996 Olympics. He also coached Canada's women's team, achieving fourth place in the 2003 World Cup and an impressive 5th place in the 2008 Olympics. == References == Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Norwegian football managers
title: Even Pellerud
